name: Dungeon Redemption (itch)
description:
You are an unforgivable convict, with only one way to salvation... You have been employed by the cold companies of the future as their expendable loot finder. Explore procedurally generated dungeons filled with randomized loot and slay monsters with various futuristic guns you find. Everything can be traded in for money...

This was a game made in 72 hours for the kjam#1 by me Daniel Dingley on the programming and Lizzie Steele on the artwork.

Post a picture of you're highest amount of money got without dying in the comments below, it'd be interesting to see how other people deal with it :)
